transcripts.text: Almost everybody running for president as a Democrat is upset about something called assault weapons.

And a renewal of the assault weapons ban.

Whether it's a forward grip or a barrel shroud or a threaded barrel for attaching a suppressor, none of those things make a gun more powerful or more deadly.  They're cosmetic features.  They don't make it more military style, but they do make them illegal under this proposed law.  Handguns under the bill are targeted the same way.  The bill would ban any semi-automatic handgun pistol that weighs more than 50 ounces.  The gun doesn't have to do anything else. elected members of our House of Representatives that have referred to law-abiding gun owners as, and I quote, domestic terrorists.
